original_title: The Vixens of Kung Fu (A Tale of Yin Yang)
overview: A hooker is drugged and gang raped, runs away and finds protection with a clan of girls trained in kung fu by a martial artist. With this help, the young woman will take her revenge.
tagline: You'll Get A Kick Out Of Them!
title: The Vixens of Kung Fu (A Tale of Yin Yang)
